amount.description:
This is the amount. Maximum limit is 5 digits before decimal.
Example: 12.45

currency.description:
This is the currency code for the amount.
Example: USD
Click here to see Currency codes

additionalMeasures.description: This object contains additional quantitative information other than weight and quantity to calculate duties and taxes.

units.description: Unit of measure used to express the quantity of this commodity line item.

numberOfPieces.description:
Indicate the number of pieces associated with the commodity. The value can neither be negative nor exceed 9,999.
Example: 12

quantity.description:
This is the units quantity (using quantityUnits as the unit of measure) per commodity. This is used to estimate duties and taxes.
Example: 125

quantityUnits.description:
This is the unit of measure for the units quantity. This is used to estimate duties and taxes.
Example: EA
click here to see Commodity Unit Measures

amount.description:
This is the amount. Maximum limit is 5 digits before decimal.
Example: 12.45

currency.description:
This is the currency code for the amount.
Example: USD
Click here to see Currency codes

countryOfManufacture.description:
This is commodity country of manufacture. This is required for International shipments. Maximum allowed length is 4.
Example: US
click here to see Country codes

cIMarksAndNumbers.description:
This is an identifying mark or number used on the packaging of a shipment to help customers identify a particular shipment
Example: 87123

harmonizedCode.description:
This is to specify the Harmonized Tariff System (HTS) code to meet U.S. and foreign governments' customs requirements. These are mainly used to estimate the duties and taxes.
Example: 0613
To research the classification for your commodity, use the FedEx Global Trade Manager online at fedex.com/gtm. You will find country-specific information to determine whether your commodity is considered to be a document or non-document for your destination.

description.description:
This is the commodity description. Maximum allowed 450 characters.
click here to see Vague commodity descriptions

name.description:
This is Commodity name.
Example: Non-Threaded Rivets

units.description: Indicate the weight unit type. The package and commodity weight unit should be the same else the request will result in an error.

value.description:
This is the weight. Maximum length is 99999.
Example: 68.25

weight.description:
These are the package weight details.
Note: Weight is not required for One rate shipments

exportLicenseNumber.description:
This is the export license number for the shipment.
Example: 26456

exportLicenseExpirationDate.description:
Specify the export license expiration date for the shipment.
Format YYYY-MM-DD
Example : 2009-04-12

purpose.description: This is the purpose of this shipment. This is used for calculation of duties and taxes.
